abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan would help meet
            priority import requirements of spare parts and track
            maintenance equipment and tools for the railways, equipment
            for the Central Mechanical Equipment Department and
            Technical Assistance. The loan would rehabilitate a very
            vital sector in the economy. It would increase locomotive
            availability, the wagon fleet, equipment and tools, and in
            general, the effective capacity of the transport system.
            There are no identifiable risks associated with the
            operation per se.
